overview: Fan Siu-Wong returns in this latest adventure of Ricky.  In his quest to win all fights, Ricky keeps pushing himself to the limits until  he passes out one day and ends up in the hospital. After he recovers,  Ricky promises his girlfriend that he will never fight again.  But when a mysterious fighter calling himself The Warrior challenges Ricky to a fight,  Ricky must step in the ring once again to win back his confidence and his Power King

production_companies.name: Hong Kong Au Chun Film Production Company

title: The Boxing King
